reviews.review_msg: Carolyn is one of the best profs I've ever had. For a hard course like MSE 222, the lectures are amazing and I don't think anyone could have taught this better than her. She is very caring and will definitely understand if you go to her with a problem. She is very open to feedback, and is very adjusting according to the needs of the students.
The most amazing prof in MSE by far. take any class by her, you won't regret it.

Carolyn is by far the most awesome MSE prof. She is the perfect example of what a prof should aim to be. She is not the best at explaining things, but she has clear criteria in everything. She is very nice and caring about the students. She makes a really hard class easy to pass (not an easy A though) Clear grading criteria too :)
